```{r}
library(ggplot2)

x <- "#99cccc"

to_rgb <- col2rgb(x)
```


```{r}
to_red <- to_rgb
to_red[[3]] <- to_red[[3]] * 0.9
to_red[[2]] <- to_red[[2]] * 0.
#to_red[[1]] <- to_red[[1]] * 1.2

x_red <- rgb(to_red[[1]], to_red[[2]], to_red[[3]], maxColorValue = 255)

x <- rgb(128, 154, 31, maxColorValue = 255)
x_red <- rgb(17, 175, 12, maxColorValue = 255)

ggplot(data = data.frame(x = 1:2, y = 2)) +
  geom_col(aes(x = x, y = y), fill = c(x, x_red)) + 
  theme_minimal()

```
